judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Copeland at 4 D. & C. 2d 722, costs to be borne by the estate.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Vincent E. Williams and Robert H. Rial, with them Smith, Best & Horn, and Walls, Rial & Morrell, for appellant.

Brown Estate.

Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Vincent E. Williams and Robert H. Rial, with them Smith, Best & Horn, and Walls, Rial & Morrell, for appellant.

January 13, 1956:
